General.Name: Shanghai Jinqiao Export Processing Zone Development Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Jinqiao Export Processing Zone Development Co., Ltd. develops, operates, sells, and leases real estate properties in China. Its property portfolio comprises apartment-style hotels, and commercial and office buildings. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Ms. Qiao Li  Mao
2.Title: Director of Operations, Deputy GM & Staff Director
